Queen's Gambit.Name: Queen's Gambit
Queen's Gambit.Summary: The Queen's Gambit is one of the oldest openings and is still commonly played today. It is traditionally described as a gambit because White appears to sacrifice the c-pawn; however, this could be considered a misnomer as Black cannot retain the pawn without incurring a disadvantage.
